description:
-  In this talk, we will talk about the often-overlooked issue of dead
   code and its significance.
-  We will explore not just the 'what' and 'how' of identifying unused
   code, but also the 'why'—emphasizing its crucial role in maintaining
   project health and agility.
-  This talk aims to provide Python developers with a clear, complete,
   and compelling understanding of dead code, its impacts, and effective
   strategies for its removal.
-  We will focus on practical solutions, showcasing the use of Python
   libraries Vulture and Deadcode, and demonstrate how to integrate
   these tools into your CI/CD pipelines for streamlined dead code
   removal.
title: Breathing Life into Python: Automated Cleanup of the Dead Code
